meaning: to be glad that you no longer have to deal with someone
label: figurative
source: She was relieved [[to see the back of the problem]] after finding a solution

meaning: to be glad that you no longer have to deal with someone
label: literal
source: He had [[to see the back of the problem]] by flipping the paper over

meaning: an irresistible victory
label: figurative
source: The team [[made a clean sweep]] by winning all the matches in the tournament
translation_ko: 팀은 토너먼트의 모든 경기에서 승리하며 [[압승을 거두었습니다]]

meaning: an irresistible victory
label: literal
source: The janitor [[made a clean sweep]] of the classroom floor
translation_ko: 청소부는 교실 바닥을 [[깨끗하게 청소했습니다]]

meaning: to be at serious risk.
label: figurative
source: [[She put it on the line]] when she confronted her boss about the unfair treatment

meaning: to be at serious risk.
label: literal
source: [[She put it on the line]] to dry after washing her clothes

meaning: to deceive someone
label: figurative
source: [[They pulled the wool over her eyes]] by pretending to be a wealthy businessman

meaning: to deceive someone
label: literal
source: During the surprise party preparations, [[they pulled the wool over her eyes]] with a blindfold

meaning: the act of stealing
label: figurative
source: The plagiarized book seemed [[to rip off the cover]] of the original work

meaning: the act of stealing
label: literal
source: With a strong pull, he managed [[to rip off the cover]] of the old book

meaning: To be able to act without having to depend on anyone.
label: figurative
source: They decided [[to paddle their own canoe]] and start their own business

meaning: To be able to act without having to depend on anyone.
label: literal
source: They had [[to paddle their own canoe]] to reach the other side of the lake

meaning: to die
label: figurative
source: The old couple, inseparable in life, [[kicked the bucket together]] in their sleep

meaning: to die
label: literal
source: While cleaning the barn, they accidentally [[kicked the bucket together]] and spilled water everywhere

meaning: a problem or difficulty that is predictable, or seems likely to arise in the future
label: figurative
source: Despite the success of the project, there was [[a cloud on the horizon]] in the form of budget cuts
translation_ko: 프로젝트의 성공에도 불구하고 예산 삭감이라는 [[골치 아픈 문제]]가 형태를 드러냈다

meaning: a problem or difficulty that is predictable, or seems likely to arise in the future
label: literal
source: As we looked out to sea, we noticed [[a cloud on the horizon]] signaling an approaching storm
translation_ko: 우리가 바다를 바라보았을 때 [[지평선 상에서]] 폭풍을 예고하는 [[구름을]] 눈치챘습니다

meaning: to be too ashamed or embarrassed of something
label: figurative
source: She [[wouldn't be seen dead in that]] outfit, as it was completely out of style
translation_ko: 의상이 완전히 유행이 지났기 때문에, 그녀는 [[매우 창피했습니다]]

meaning: to be too ashamed or embarrassed of something
label: literal
source: As a vampire, he [[wouldn't be seen dead in that]] garlic-infused restaurant
translation_ko: 뱀파이어로서 그는 마늘향이 우려진 식당에서 [[죽은 것으로 보이지 않을 것입니다]]

meaning: to decline something that someone has offered.
label: figurative
source: At the party, he politely [[turned down a glass]] when offered a drink
translation_ko: 파티에서,그는 술을 제안받았을때 정중하게 [[ 거절했습니다 ]]

meaning: to decline something that someone has offered.
label: literal
source: She [[turned down a glass]] upside down to let it dry
translation_ko: 그녀는 잔의 물을 말리기 위해  [[잔을 거꾸로 뒤집었다]]

meaning: to celebrate and have a wild time
label: figurative
source: After winning the championship, they decided [[to paint the town red together]] and celebrate

meaning: to celebrate and have a wild time
label: literal
source: As part of a community art project, they decided [[to paint the town red together]] by covering the walls with vibrant murals

meaning: verbatim; word for word details.
label: figurative
source: When asked about the new policy, she [[gave them chapter and verse]] on the company's regulations
translation_ko: 새로운 정책에 대해 물어보자 그녀는 그들에게 회사의 규정에 대해 [[상세하게 설명해주었습니다]]

meaning: verbatim; word for word details.
label: literal
source: The priest [[gave them chapter and verse]] from the Bible during the sermon
translation_ko: 성직자는 설교 도중 그들에게 성경의 [[구절을 전달하였습니다]]

idiom: know which side one's bread is buttered
meaning: to be cognizant of where one's interests lie in a given situation.
label: figurative
source: He always supports the boss's decisions, showing that he [[knows which side his bread is buttered]]

idiom: know which side one's bread is buttered
meaning: to be cognizant of where one's interests lie in a given situation.
label: literal
source: He carefully observed the sandwich and [[knows which side his bread is buttered]] to avoid getting his hands greasy

meaning: to only know a very small part of the problem
label: figurative
source: The problems we discovered were [[just the tip of the iceberg]] in this company

meaning: to only know a very small part of the problem
label: literal
source: As we approached the glacier, we saw [[just the tip of the iceberg]] above the water

meaning: to follow the correct steps in order to get something done
label: figurative
source: He [[went through channels to get]] the necessary approval for his project

meaning: to follow the correct steps in order to get something done
label: literal
source: The water [[went through channels to get]] to the other side of the dam

meaning: a susceptible or vulnerable area.
label: figurative
source: After analyzing their strategy, we [[found a chink in their armour]] that we could exploit
translation_ko: 그들의 전략을 분석한 후 우리는 그들에게서 우리가 이용할 수 있는 [[약점을 발견했습니다]]

meaning: a susceptible or vulnerable area.
label: literal
source: While examining the knight's suit, he [[found a chink in their armour]] that needed repair
translation_ko: 기사의 갑옷을 조사하다가 그는 수리가 필요한 [[갑옷 사이의 틈을 발견했습니다]]

meaning: the presence of something very bad in the best
label: figurative
source: Despite the company's success, [[they found a worm in the apple]] when they discovered the corruption
translation_ko: 회사의 성공에도 불구하고 부패를 발견했을 때 [[그들은 뭔가 매우 나쁜 것을 찾았습니다]]

meaning: the presence of something very bad in the best
label: literal
source: While eating their fruit, [[they found a worm in the apple]] and felt disgusted
translation_ko: 과일을 먹다가 [[그들은 사과에서 벌레를 발견하고는]] 혐오감을 느꼈습니다.

meaning: to start a new job or activity without being prepared for it
label: figurative
source: On her first day at work, she [[was thrown in at the deep end]] with a challenging project

meaning: to start a new job or activity without being prepared for it
label: literal
source: During swimming lessons, he [[was thrown in at the deep end]] of the pool to test his skills

meaning: thinking of some impossible task
label: figurative
source: He spent his days [[building castles in the air]] instead of focusing on his job
translation_ko: 그는 일에 집중하기보다는 [[망상을 하는 데]] 시간을 보냈습니다

meaning: thinking of some impossible task
label: literal
source: The artist created a stunning installation of [[building castles in the air]] using lightweight materials
translation_ko: 예술가는 가벼운 소재를 활용하여 [[공중에 성을 짓는]] 아름다운 건축을 창조해냈습니다

meaning: to make an extra effort
label: figurative
source: To make sure the project was perfect, [[he went the extra mile]] and double - checked everything

meaning: to make an extra effort
label: literal
source: During the marathon, [[he went the extra mile]] by mistake due to a wrong turn

meaning: a significant change in circumstances.
label: figurative
source: After the company's merger, [[it's a whole new ball game]] for the employees
translation_ko: 회사의 합병이후 직원들의 [[상황이 완전히 달라졌습니다]].
translation_zh: 公司合并后，对员工来说[[变化巨大]]

meaning: a significant change in circumstances.
label: literal
source: When they switched from soccer to baseball, [[it's a whole new ball game]] for the players
translation_ko: 축구에서 야구로 종목을 바꾸자 선수들은 [[전혀 다른 구기 종목을 하게 됩니다]].
translation_zh: 对这些球员来说，当从足球转成棒球后，[[比赛类型是全新的]]

meaning: to be exactly right about something or achieve the best result possible
label: figurative
source: Her speech [[hit the bull's-eye]] and resonated with the audience

meaning: to be exactly right about something or achieve the best result possible
label: literal
source: With a steady hand, she aimed and [[hit the bull's-eye]] on the target

idiom: at the drop of the hat
meaning: to do something easily and without any preparation
label: figurative
source: She was always [[ready at the drop of a hat]] to help her friends
translation_ko: 그녀는 친구들을 돕기 위한 [[만반의 준비가]] 항상 [[되어있었습니다]]
translation_zh: 她一直[[随时准备好]]帮助她的朋友

idiom: at the drop of the hat
meaning: to do something easily and without any preparation
label: literal
source: As a professional hat catcher, he was [[ready at the drop of a hat]] to catch any falling hats
translation_ko: 전문 모자 잡이로서, 그는 언제든 [[떨어지는 모자를 잡기 위해 준비가 되어 있었습니다]]
translation_zh: 作为一个专业的接帽子的人，他[[准备好在帽子掉下时]]抓住下落的帽子

meaning: To tell someone to use their brain more in analysing what they are doing.
label: figurative
source: [[They used their loaf]] to solve the complex puzzle
translation_ko: 복잡한 퍼즐을 풀기 위해 [[ 최대한 그들의 지식과 생각을 도출했습니다  ]]

meaning: To tell someone to use their brain more in analysing what they are doing.
label: literal
source: [[They used their loaf]] of bread to make sandwiches for lunch
translation_ko: 그들은 점심으로 샌드위치를 만들기 위해 [[ 한 덩어리의 빵을 사용했습니다 ]]

meaning: do what is required
label: figurative
source: The new employee [[delivered the goods on time]] by meeting all the project deadlines
translation_ko: 새로운 직원은 모든 프로젝트 마감일을 준수하여 [[해야할 일을 했습니다]]
translation_zh: 新雇员[[准时]]在截止日期前[[完成了工作]]。

meaning: do what is required
label: literal
source: The courier [[delivered the goods on time]] to the customer's doorstep
translation_ko: 택배 기사는 [[시간에 맞춰 상품을]] 고객의 문앞까지 배송했습니다
translation_zh: 快递员[[把东西准时送到]]顾客门口。

meaning: This phrase refers to direct family members, people that share a DNA, that is, flesh and blood.
label: figurative
source: I couldn't believe [[my own flesh and blood]] would betray me like that

meaning: This phrase refers to direct family members, people that share a DNA, that is, flesh and blood.
label: literal
source: The horror movie showed a scene where [[my own flesh and blood]] was exposed after a terrible accident

meaning: to get into something that is messy, has problems and is unwanted
label: figurative
source: By asking about his past, she inadvertently [[opened a can of worms]] in their conversation
translation_ko: 대화 도중 그의 과거를 캐물음으로써 그녀는 무심코 [[곤란한 상황에 빠졌습니다]]

meaning: to get into something that is messy, has problems and is unwanted
label: literal
source: The fisherman [[opened a can of worms]] to bait his hook
translation_ko: 낚시꾼이 낚시바늘에 미끼를 달기 위해 [[지렁이로 가득 찬 통을 열었습니다]]

meaning: to do what is recommended by someone else
label: figurative
source: You should [[take a cue from her]] and start organizing your time better
translation_ko: 당신은 [[그녀가 추천하는 일을 해야 하고]] 시간을 더 잘 정리하기 시작해야 합니다

meaning: to do what is recommended by someone else
label: literal
source: During the pool game, he decided to [[take a cue from her]] and use her favorite one
translation_ko: 당구 게임 중에 그는 [[그녀에게서 신호를 받아]] 그녀가 가장 좋아하는 것을 사용하기로 결정했습니다.

meaning: to have drink to celebrate the birth of a baby
label: figurative
source: After the birth of their child, they invited friends over to [[wet the baby's head]] with a small celebration
translation_ko:
아이가 태어난 후 친구들을 [[아기의 탄생을
 축하하기 위해]]초대하여 작은 잔치를 베풀었습니다

meaning: to have drink to celebrate the birth of a baby
label: literal
source: During the baptism ceremony, the priest gently [[wet the baby's head]] with holy water
translation_ko:
세례식에서 사제는 성수로 부드럽게 
[[아기의 머리를 적셨습니다 ]]

meaning: to talk about oneself or one's achievements especially in a way that shows pride or too much pride
label: figurative
source: He never hesitates to [[blow his own horn]] about his accomplishments
translation_ko: 그는 자신의 업적에 대해 [[자신을 과시하는 것을]] 절대로 주저하지 않습니다

meaning: to talk about oneself or one's achievements especially in a way that shows pride or too much pride
label: literal
source: As a trumpet player, he would [[blow his own horn]] during practice
translation_ko: 트럼펫 연주자로서 그는 연습 도중에 [[뿔피리를 불곤]] 했습니다

meaning: although you don't quite agree with someone, it's their choice and you think they should so whatever makes them happy
label: figurative
source: When it comes to choosing a hobby, I believe in [[whatever floats my boat]]
translation_ko:
취미를 고를 때 나는 [[내가 정말 하고싶고 
좋아하는것]]을 선택합니다

meaning: although you don't quite agree with someone, it's their choice and you think they should so whatever makes them happy
label: literal
source: I'm open to trying any buoyant object, [[whatever floats my boat]] on the lake
translation_ko: 나는 호수에서 [[내 보트에 뜨는 것은 무엇이든]] 부력이 있는 물체라면 무엇이든 시도해 볼 수 있습니다.

meaning: difficulty of accepting and makes you angry or resentful
label: figurative
source: The insincere compliment [[stuck in his throat]] as he tried to praise his rival
translation_ko: 상대를 칭찬하려다가 진심 없는 칭찬이 [[그를 분개하게 만들었습니다]]

meaning: difficulty of accepting and makes you angry or resentful
label: literal
source: The fish bone [[stuck in his throat]] while he was eating dinner
translation_ko: 저녁을 먹다가 생선가시가 [[목에 걸렸습니다]]

meaning: be in a winning position.
label: figurative
source: During the negotiation, [[he held all the aces]] and had the upper hand

meaning: be in a winning position.
label: literal
source: During the poker game, [[he held all the aces]] in his hand

meaning: celebrate; enjoy oneself.
label: figurative
source: For her birthday, [[we pushed the boat out]] and threw a huge party

meaning: celebrate; enjoy oneself.
label: literal
source: [[We pushed the boat out]] into the water to start our fishing trip

meaning: certain actions or activities cannot be performed alone - they  need two people to participate
label: figurative
source: When it comes to resolving conflicts, remember that [[it takes two to tango]]
translation_ko: 갈등을 해결할 때 [[혼자할 수 없고, 양측이 모두 필요하다]] 것을 기억하세요

meaning: certain actions or activities cannot be performed alone - they  need two people to participate
label: literal
source: In a dance competition, the judges reminded the participants that [[it takes two to tango]]
translation_ko: 댄스 경연 대회에서 심사위원들은 참가자들에게 [[탱고를 하려면 2명이 있어야한다]]라고 상기시켰습니다

meaning: to have strong feelings for someone with whom you do not or cannot have a relationship
label: figurative
source: He's been [[carrying the torch for her]] since high school, but she never noticed
translation_ko: 그는 고등학교 이후 [[그녀를 짝사랑해왔지만]] 그녀는 알아채지 못했습니다

meaning: to have strong feelings for someone with whom you do not or cannot have a relationship
label: literal
source: During the relay race, he was [[carrying the torch for her]] until it was her turn to run
translation_ko: 릴레이 경기 도중 그는 그녀가 뛸 차례가 될 때 까지 [[횃불 봉송을 짊어졌다]]

meaning: to be aware of the information
label: figurative
source: As a team member, I want to be [[kept in the loop]] about project updates

meaning: to be aware of the information
label: literal
source: The rope was [[kept in the loop]] to secure the boat to the dock

meaning: to do something that will be the cause of your own failure or ruin your chances in the future
label: figurative
source: By revealing company secrets, he [[cut his own throat]] and ruined his career
translation_ko: 회사 비밀을 공개함으로써 그는 [[자멸을 초래했고]] 자신의 커리어를 망쳤습니다
translation_zh: 因为泄露公司机密，他[[搬起石头砸了自己的脚]]，毁了事业。

meaning: to do something that will be the cause of your own failure or ruin your chances in the future
label: literal
source: While shaving, he accidentally [[cut his own throat]] with the razor
translation_ko: 면도를 하던 그는 실수로 면도날로 [[자신의 목을 베었습니다]]
translation_zh: 他刮胡子时，不小心用刮胡刀[[切到了自己的喉咙]]。

meaning: in clandestine
label: figurative
source: The board members discussed the matter [[behind closed doors]] to maintain confidentiality
translation_ko: 이사회 구성원들은 기밀성을 유지하기 위해 문제를 [[비밀리에]] 논의했습니다
translation_zh: 出于保密原因，董事会成员们[[秘密地]]讨论了这项事宜。

meaning: in clandestine
label: literal
source: They stood [[behind closed doors]] while discussing the matter, as the room was too noisy
translation_ko: 그들은 방이 너무 시끄러워지자 토론을 하는 동안 [[닫힌 문 뒤에]] 서있었습니다
translation_zh: 外面房间太吵了，所以他们[[关起门来]]对这项事宜进行了讨论。

meaning: die
label: figurative
source: Our beloved grandmother [[passed away peacefully]] in her sleep

meaning: die
label: literal
source: The storm [[passed away peacefully]], leaving a calm and clear sky

meaning: having a rich or privileged background
label: figurative
source: He [[was born with a silver spoon]] in his mouth, inheriting a fortune from his family

meaning: having a rich or privileged background
label: literal
source: In a unique family tradition, every child [[was born with a silver spoon]] placed beside them

meaning: something that cannot be repeated, usually a positive concept
label: figurative
source: His sudden success turned out to be [[a flash in the pan]], as he couldn't maintain it

meaning: something that cannot be repeated, usually a positive concept
label: literal
source: The oil caught fire, creating [[a flash in the pan]] while she was cooking

meaning: to try to recover your confidence or spirit after a defeat, failure or disappointment
label: figurative
source: He [[licked his wounds after the fight]] by taking some time to recover from the emotional blow

meaning: to try to recover your confidence or spirit after a defeat, failure or disappointment
label: literal
source: The injured dog [[licked his wounds after the fight]] with another canine

meaning: get rid of all doubts and negative feelings
label: figurative
source: After the argument, [[we cleared the air with her]] by discussing our feelings
translation_ko: 논쟁 이후 우리는 서로의 감정을 털어놓으면서 [[오해를 풀고 의혹을 없앴습니다]]

meaning: get rid of all doubts and negative feelings
label: literal
source: [[We cleared the air with her]] by opening the windows to let the smoke out
translation_ko: 우리는 창문을 열고 연기를 내보내어 [[그녀와의 공기를 맑게 했습니다]]

meaning: to experience a lot of problems in a period of life
label: figurative
source: After losing her job, she was [[going through a rough patch]] in her life

meaning: to experience a lot of problems in a period of life
label: literal
source: While hiking, we were [[going through a rough patch]] filled with rocks and thorns

meaning: to make the wrong decision and support a person or action that is later unsuccessful
label: figurative
source: [[She backed the wrong horse]] when she supported the losing candidate
translation_ko: 그녀는 지는 후보를 지지하는 [[잘못된 선택을 했습니다]]
translation_zh: 她[[站错了队]]，支持了失败的候选人。

meaning: to make the wrong decision and support a person or action that is later unsuccessful
label: literal
source: At the racetrack, [[she backed the wrong horse]] and lost her bet
translation_ko: 경마장에서 [[그녀는 잘못된 말에 돈을 걸었고]], 그 돈을 잃었습니다
translation_zh: 她在赛马场[[押注了错误的马匹]]，因而输掉了赌注。

meaning: to annoy someone so much that they cannot get on with what they are doing
label: figurative
source: The constant questions from his coworkers [[got in his hair]] and made it difficult to concentrate

meaning: to annoy someone so much that they cannot get on with what they are doing
label: literal
source: The confetti from the party [[got in his hair]] and took a while to remove

idiom: pull a rabbit out of the hat
meaning: do something unexpected or surprising
label: figurative
source: Our team [[pulled a rabbit out of the hat]] by winning the game in the last minute

idiom: pull a rabbit out of the hat
meaning: do something unexpected or surprising
label: literal
source: The magician [[pulled a rabbit out of the hat]] during his performance

meaning: to wipe the past out and begin afresh
label: figurative
source: After apologizing, they decided [[to start with a clean slate]] and rebuild their friendship
translation_ko: 사과를 주고받은 후 그들은  [[과거를 잊고 새출발해서]] 서로간의 우정을 재구축하기로 결심했습니다

meaning: to wipe the past out and begin afresh
label: literal
source: The artist decided [[to start with a clean slate]] by wiping off the chalkboard
translation_ko: 예술가는 칠판을 지우며 [[깨끗한 석면에 다시 시작하기로]] 했습니다

meaning: to make you angry
label: figurative
source: The sound of nails on a chalkboard [[makes his hackles rise]]

meaning: to make you angry
label: literal
source: When the dog senses danger, it [[makes his hackles rise]] on his back

idiom: the devil is beating his wife
meaning: raining whereas the sun is shining.
label: figurative
source: While the sun was shining, it started raining, and people said [[the devil is beating his wife]]

idiom: the devil is beating his wife
meaning: raining whereas the sun is shining.
label: literal
source: In the theatrical performance, the actor playing Satan acted out a scene where [[the devil is beating his wife]]

meaning: to make public something embarrassing that should be kept secret
label: figurative
source: During the family reunion, [[they aired their dirty laundry]] in front of everyone
translation_ko: 가족 모임 도중에 [[그들은]] 모두 앞에서 [[자신의 치부를 드러냈습니다]]

meaning: to make public something embarrassing that should be kept secret
label: literal

meaning: a young person who turns out to be beautiful or talented against all expectations.

source: Her transformation from a shy girl to a confident woman was [[an ugly duckling story]]

meaning: a young person who turns out to be beautiful or talented against all expectations.
label: literal

source: During the parade, he was [[blowing his own trumpet]] as part of the marching band

meaning: refers to a situation where things are not really clear

label: figurative

그들은  SNS에서 자신의 사생활을 다투다가 
[[공개적으로 드러나게 되었습니다 ]]

idiom: bite off more than one can chew

label: literal

일련의 좌절 후에,
 [[ 상황은 우리 프로젝트에 통제할수 없이 잘못된
방향을 초래하기 시작했습니다  ]]

label: literal

label: figurative

label: literal

meaning: ask for something that is very difficult or impossible to get

meaning: saying that you are all ears means the other person has got your full attention in terms of listening to him
label: figurative

translation_ko: 그녀가 이야기를 시작했을 때 난 [[집중해서 귀기울여 들을 것]]을 약속했습니다

meaning: saying that you are all ears means the other person has got your full attention in terms of listening to him
label: literal

translation_ko: 초현실주의 예술 전시회에서 벽면들은 마치 [[모두 귀]]처럼 보였습니다

meaning: to exhaust someone's energies or resources by leading a hectic life.

idiom: burn the candle at both ends
meaning: to exhaust someone's energies or resources by leading a hectic life.

idiom: not hurt a fly or flea
meaning: To not be able to cause harm to anyone, including even a tiny and insignificant insect.
label: figurative

idiom: not hurt a fly or flea
meaning: To not be able to cause harm to anyone, including even a tiny and insignificant insect.
label: literal
source: She was so careful with her bug collection that she [[wouldn't hurt a fly]] while handling them

label: figurative

meaning: going unnoticed, avoiding unnecessary attention
label: literal
source: The technician [[was working under the radar]] equipment to fix a malfunction

meaning: to criticize someone severely because you are angry with them
label: figurative
source: The guilt of lying to her best friend [[it ate her alive]] for days
translation_ko: 그녀의 절친한 친구에게 거짓말한 죄책감이 며칠 동안 [[그녀를 힘들게 했습니다]]
translation_zh: 对她朋友撒谎的罪恶感让她几天[[彷徨不安]]

meaning: to criticize someone severely because you are angry with them
label: literal
source: In the horror movie, the monster found her hiding spot and [[it ate her alive]]
translation_ko: 공포 영화에서 괴물이 그녀의 은신처를 찾아내어 [[그녀를 산 채로 먹어치웠습니다]]
translation_zh: 在恐怖电影里，怪兽发现了她的藏身之处并[[生吞]]了她

meaning: loss of courage
label: figurative
source: [[She got cold feet]] just before her big presentation

meaning: loss of courage

translation_ko: 마땅한 신발 없이 눈밭을 걸어다니다보니 [[그녀는 발이 시렸습니다]]

meaning: to play a secondary or minor role with regards to someone else
label: figurative
source: He didn't like [[playing second fiddle to her]] in the company hierarchy

meaning: to play a secondary or minor role with regards to someone else
label: literal
source: In the orchestra, he was [[playing second fiddle to her]] during the performance

meaning: to have an important standing in society
label: figurative
source: He was [[so high up]] in the company that he had direct access to the CEO

meaning: to have an important standing in society
label: literal
source: The mountain peak was [[so high up]] that it was covered in snow

meaning: to fight with another person physically or verbally.
label: figurative
source: During the heated debate, she [[crossed swords with him]] over their differing opinions
translation_ko: 열띈 토론 도중 그녀는 그와 대립하는 의견 때문에 [[격론을 벌이게 되었습니다]]

meaning: to fight with another person physically or verbally.
label: literal
source: At the fencing tournament, they [[crossed swords with him]] in a thrilling match
translation_ko: 펜싱 토너먼트에서 그들은 그와 흥미진진한 경기에서 [[검을 맞대고 싸웠습니다]]

meaning: make someone act or think in a wrong or foolish manner.
label: figurative
source: The false information [[led them astray]] in their investigation

meaning: make someone act or think in a wrong or foolish manner.
label: literal
source: The broken compass [[led them astray]] in the dense forest

meaning: everything, all of something
label: figurative
source: [[She went the whole nine yards]] to make his birthday special
translation_ko: [[그녀는]] 그의 생일을 특별하게 만들기 위해 [[모든것을 했습니다 ]]

meaning: everything, all of something
label: literal
source: The fabric store required her to buy the fabric in bulk, so [[she went the whole nine yards]]
translation_ko: 천 가게는 그녀에게 천을 대량으로 사라고 요구했기 때문에 [[그녀는 9야드를 통째로 갔습니다]]

meaning: have a romantic relationship with someone
label: figurative
source: After dating for a few months, [[they decided to go steady]] and become exclusive

meaning: have a romantic relationship with someone
label: literal
source: During the balance exercise, [[they decided to go steady]] and avoid sudden movements

meaning: to have a suspicion that something is wrong
label: figurative
source: When he started avoiding my questions, [[I smelled something fishy]] about his story
translation_ko: 그가 내 질문을 피하기 시작했을 때 그의 이야기에 대해 [[나는 뭔가 잘못됐다고 의심을 품었습니다]]

meaning: to have a suspicion that something is wrong
label: literal
source: Walking past the seafood market, [[I smelled something fishy]] in the air
translation_ko: 수산시장 지나서 [[나는]] 공기에서 [[비린내 냄새가 맡았습니다]]

meaning: being anxious or nervous
label: figurative
source: While anticipating the exam results, we were [[waiting on pins and needles]]

meaning: being anxious or nervous
label: literal
source: During the acupressure therapy session, she was [[waiting on pins and needles]] placed on her back
